QuestData.Title: Do it Yourself
QuestData.Description: We need to send a message to several deadbeats. Of course, they're hiding out in Drudgetown, the scum. I know how you hate going into the slums, boss-$g man : lady;, but what can we do?$B$B<Sassy rifles through some paperwork.>$B$BI have all of the names right here.$B$BMight I suggest a little 'personal visit'? A couple of strategic beatdowns will send a message to the other debtors AND your competition.$B$B$n is not a goblin to be trifled with!
QuestData.LogDescription: Beat down Bruno Flameretardant, Frankie Gearslipper, Jack the Hammer, and Sudsy Magee.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that all of them? Let's cross-check the list real quick just to be sure.
QuestData.RewardText: A complete success if I do say so myself, $g sir : ma'am;! Your debtors will think twice now about not paying up!$B$B<Sassy taps her pencil against her lower lip for a moment, deep in thought.>$B$BPerhaps we should increase interest rates on loans across the board?
